summary: Implemented a reusable searchable bank dropdown (NigerianBankSelect) backed by a centralized Nigerian banks config module, and wired it into both SendToBankSheet and WithdrawalsPage (at least via imports). However, the provided bank list does not appear to be a full Nigerian bank list (several commonly recognized banks are missing).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a full Nigerian bank list (maintained static list) in the frontend to be used as selectable options source for payout-method creation.
missing_requirements.reason: A static list exists, but it does not appear to be a full Nigerian bank list as requested by the BuildRequest title/intent; several widely known Nigerian banks are absent from the exported array (e.g., Jaiz Bank).
